AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: a dangerous route through South Texas where an alien died from probable heat stroke, contributed to Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez's death, guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero with inadequate supplies, traversed on foot in June and July, involves desert-like brush, temperatures reached 100-105 degrees during the journey, poses risks due to hot summer conditions with inadequate water and food, and includes guiding aliens through South Texas desert-like brush, created substantial risk, involved transporting aliens with inadequate water and food in the heat of the summer, caused death within the meaning of United States
